title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump's Most Damaging Obamacare Sabotage
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump's Most Damaging Obamacare Sabotage
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Max Nisen\u0010Health Care Columnist\u0010Bloomberg Gadfly\u0010Discussing the executive order President Donald Trump signed Thursday which has the potential to disrupt the Affordable Care Act's individual insurance exchanges.  His move Friday to immediately stop paying an important subsidy for insurers will disrupt them; the next payment is due in five days. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
